source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Haloragaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1996). Haloragaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 3. Dicotyledons Winteraceae to Myrtaceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Main stems more or less erect, to 25 cm tall, weak; leaves filiform, widely spaced, thin textured, usually 15–22 mm long, margins often with 1 or 2 lobes near middle
Main stems prostrate, relatively stout, tips ascending or erect, to 10 cm tall; leaves linear to terete, closely spaced, more or less fleshy, usually 4–11 mm long, entire
